mapper.select: SELECT T2.TEAM_NAME ,T3.NAME ,T3.EMAIL ,T3.BACK_NUMBER ,T1.GAME_RECORD_AUTH_CODE FROM GAME_RECORD_AUTH T1 INNER JOIN GAME_JOIN_TEAM T2 ON T1.GAME_SEQ = T2.GAME_SEQ INNER JOIN GAME_JOIN_PLAYER T3 ON T2.GAME_JOIN_TEAM_SEQ = T3.GAME_JOIN_TEAM_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND T1.GAME_SEQ = #{gameSeq} AND T1.GAME_RECORD_AUTH_CODE = #{auth}
